#1 Asda car park fine query MikeB58 MikeB58 View Profile View Forum Posts View Kop Profile Annie Roader Join Date Mar 2009 Posts 480 Asda car park fine query – 15-7-10, 09:04 My mrs parked in an Asda car park for a few hours because it's handy for work (though she does shop in there as well)
She was not in a disabled bay (can't stand people that wrongly use those) or in a parent/child spec, but she's got a fine through the post because the car was there over the permitted 'free' time.
The letter is actually in my name because I'm the registred keeper, but I work nights and hardly ever drive during the day, so it wasn't even me in the Asda car park in the first place.
This was the Adsa car park in Huyton, it's a huge car park and she was parked out of the way were it was virtually empty.
I've heard various stories about such parking fines and in the main people seem to think it's safe to just ignore them, as the company that issue them have no legal clout to follow up non payment....any thoughts.
cheers.
